name: Piano vs Zombie
description:
Piano vs Zombie is the Piano game combine with Tower Defends !!!

Play now to play piano !!!

Play now to kill the enemys horde !!!

How about both of them ???

YES !!! We can do IT together now !!!

Playable Songs:

  1. ABC

  2. Baa Baa Black Sheep

  3. BINGO

  4. Do-Re-Mi

  5. If You're Happy

  6. Itsy Bitsy Spider

  7. Jingle Bells

  8. Mary Had a Little Lamb

  9. Michael Row the Boat Ashore

10. My Bonnie

11. O Christmas Tree

12. Ode To Joy

13. Oh! Susanna

14. Old McDonald Had a Farm

15. Row, row, row your boat

16. Santa Claus is Coming to Town

17. This Old Man

18. Three Blind Mice 

19. Twinkle Twinkle Little Star

20. Wheel on the Bus

21. Yankee Doodle

* Unique 23 SFX to Fun with: (12 new SFX recently added)

Beep, Ocarina, Flute, Violin, Whistle, Freeze, Mario Coin, Boing, Dripity, Go Race, Power Down, Ticking, Spawn, Swip, Warning, Swish, Throw Toon, Get Star even Cash Register and Laser! 

Guitar sound effects including distorsion!

(Scroll Song List To See the OST Songs)

PLAY NOW !!!
